thread.title: Man who wrestled rifle from Waffle House gunman denies being hero

title: Man who wrestled rifle from Waffle House gunman denies being hero
text:
Man who wrestled rifle from Waffle House gunman denies being hero 4:10am EDT - 01:34 
James Shaw Jr., the man who wrestled the rifle from a gunman who killed four people at a Waffle House in Tennessee on Sunday, denies being a hero, saying anyone in his position could have done the same. Rough Cut
